titles.title: Let Praise Keep Bubbling, Bubbling, Bubbling, O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let praise keep bubbling, bubbling, bubbling, O Lord
Let praise keep bubbling up in me. (2x.)
Let the well overflow, and the the spring spring up. (2x.)
Let praise keep bubbling, bubbling, bubbling, O Lord
Let praise keep bubbling up in me.
